name: Scientific Educational Development for Community Organisation (SEDCO)
briefDescription: Scientific Educational Development for Community Organization - abbreviated as SEDCO was started by a group of service minded persons in the year 1986. The founders resolved to work for the socio economic uplift of the rural marginalized communities in Sattankulam Taluk of Thoothukudi District, which was bifurcated from Tirunelveli District. The organization started to work under the legal platform of registration under the Tamil Nadu Societies Registration Act.  We are involving in soil and water conservation, a forestation, AIDS prevention, control, Care and support for PLHA, training of rural artisans and women, child development, watershed development, Livelihood promotion and Disaster Preparedness programs.Working with 1,75,000 people.
